page.title: 11ROADS
page.content:
THERE ARE TWO MAIN ROADS IN THE AREA THE MAIN TOOME TO RANDALSTOWN ROAD IS PART OF THE MAIN ROAD TO BELFAST AND IS THE BEGINNING OF THE M2 MOTORWAY. THERE IS A VERY GOOD BUS SERVICE IN BOTH DIRECTIONS AND THIS ROAD IS USED BY HEAVY LORRIES CARRYING GOODS TO AND FROM BELFAST.
THE OTHER ROAD FROM TOOME TO RANDALSTOWN SWINGS TOWARDS AND AWAY FROM THE LOUGH AND THERE IS NO PUBLIC TRANSPORT ON THIS ROAD SO PEOPLE HAVE TO DEPEND ON PRIVATE CARS, WHILE SCHOOL BUSES TAKE THE CHILDREN TO THE VARIOUS SECONDARY SCHOOLS IN THE AREA.
FROM THIS ROAD A NETWORK OF SMALLER ROADS RUN TO AND AROUND THE LOUGH SHORE AND OUT TO THE MAIN TOOME RANDALSTOWN ROAD.
